Pre-Game Insights: The Cubs have the ninth-ranked team ERA across all MLB pitching staffs (3.83). Rockies pitchers have a combined ERA of 5.43 ERA this year, which ranks 30th in MLB.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cody Bellinger and Brenton Doyle among those expected to deliver at the plate.
The game is scheduled to start at 3:10 p.m. ET at Coors Field in Denver, Colorado.
The Cubs are favored to win with odds of -146, while the Rockies have odds of +123.
The over/under for the game is 10.5.
